cz.zcu.kiv.dfs_simulator.view.content.selection

Interface MultiSelectable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    GraphDisplayable, MultiSelectableDraggable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    FxModelClientNode, FxModelNode, FxModelNodeLabel, FxModelServerNode, TransparentDraggableEditableTextField

    public interface MultiSelectable
    Object can be part of a multi-selection.
